name: emacs-w64
short_description:
A GNU Emacs binary distribution for users who want to use Emacs natively in 64-Bit Windows (x86_64). This project will focus on providing unmodified, up-to-date (from git master and newest release), and optimized w64 binary builds. 

Thanks to the awesome projects MSYS2 (https://sourceforge.net/projects/msys2/) and MinGW-w64 (https://sourceforge.net/projects/mingw-w64) I can bring you a fast, clean, and functional GNU Emacs for Windows.

For details concerning the build, please see the wiki page on https://sourceforge.net/p/emacsbinw64/wiki/Build%20guideline%20for%20MSYS2-MinGW-w64%20system/. 中文版请看这里：
http://chriszheng.science/2015/03/19/Chinese-version-of-Emacs-building-guideline/.

*For Win 8.1 users*: I have just upgraded to Win 8.1 and didn't find problems you met. I suggest you post the detailed information, especially the reproduction steps, to the Discussion part, so that we can help you. Thanks.
summary: 64-Bit GNU Emacs for MS Windows with optimization.
